legalMessageDefaults.legalMessageTextOne: This information is supplied as a guide and is not a substitute for legal or professional advice. It is the responsibility of the business owner to comply with all local, county, and state regulations even if they are not listed here. For no-cost assistance with your business, use the
legalMessageDefaults.legalMessageTextTwo: to speak with a Business Advocate based in New Jersey.

businessFormationDefaults.withdrawalsBody: If a general partner withdraws from the partnership, what are the remaining partners rights to contribute to the business?
businessFormationDefaults.signerNameErrorText: One or more Signer fields are empty.
businessFormationDefaults.nameCheckUnavailableText: Sorry, "${name}" isn’t available. Try another name. You can officially form your business once you've found an available name.
businessFormationDefaults.addressErrorText: Enter your street name and number.
businessFormationDefaults.partnershipRightsCanReceiveDistributions: Do limited partners have the right to receive distributions from a partner? (This can  include a return of all or any part of their partner’s contributions).
businessFormationDefaults.businessLocationInfoAlertMarkdown: **Cant find your city?** Unincorporated places are not listed here. Search for [your official jurisdiction](https://www.google.com) (you will type in your community into the local name field).
businessFormationDefaults.missingFieldsOnSubmitModalText: Review the information in the fields below for errors or omissions:
businessFormationDefaults.startDateErrorText: The business formation date must be today or a future date in format MM/DD/YYYY.
businessFormationDefaults.agentNumberErrorText: Enter the 4 to 7 digit Registered Agent ID number.
businessFormationDefaults.sameAgentAddressAsBusiness: The address is the same as the business location.
businessFormationDefaults.incorporatorsSuccessTextBody: A signer has been added successfully.
businessFormationDefaults.signerCheckboxErrorText: Sign by clicking the checkbox(s) below.
businessFormationDefaults.dissolutionBody: When and under what circumstances can a limited partnership and its affairs dissolve?
businessFormationDefaults.directorsSuccessTextBody: A director has been added successfully.
businessFormationDefaults.nameCheckEmptyFieldErrorText: Enter a business name to check availability.
businessFormationDefaults.agentOfficeAddressLine1ErrorText: Enter the agent’s office street name and number.
businessFormationDefaults.businessAddressLine1ErrorText: Enter your business’ street name and number.
businessFormationDefaults.partnershipRightsCanMakeDistributions: Do general partners have the right to make distributions to any partner? (This includes a return of all or any part of the partner’s contributions).
businessFormationDefaults.legalStructureWarningModalBody: If you change your proposed legal structure in the Navigator profile, you may be required to complete a different form. Don't worry, once you update your profile we will tell you which form you need and where you can complete it.
businessFormationDefaults.businessPurposeBodyText: Describe your business' primary activities. Businesses do this to make their business purpose searchable on the Public Record.
businessFormationDefaults.provisionsBodyText:
Outline your company's functional and financial decisions to help run the internal operations of the business. Provisions help you prevent personal legal liabilities and clarify members' rights and duties to the company to prevent misunderstandings. You can list up to 10 provisions.

Corporations may include a `class of shares|shares-class` structure and details on the rights of the Board of Directors to determine the different classes.
businessFormationDefaults.incompleteStepsOnSubmitText: The following steps are incomplete or have errors:
businessFormationDefaults.sameAgentInfoAsAccount: The agent information is the same as the account holder.
businessFormationDefaults.paymentDisclaimerText: You will be brought to a secure payment platform operated by New Jersey's partner NICUSA Inc. to process your payment.
businessFormationDefaults.partnershipRightsRadioNoText: No, they do not have the right
businessFormationDefaults.signatureAidText: Checking this box indicates your intent to formally execute the filing.
businessFormationDefaults.reviewStepPartnershipNoLimitedPartnerBod: **No**, the limited partners cannot assign other partners limited partner rights.
businessFormationDefaults.reviewStepPartnershipNoCanMakeDistributi: **No**, general partners do not have the right to make distributions to any partner. (This includes a return of all or any part of the partner’s contributions).
businessFormationDefaults.submitErrorHeading: Review the information in the fields below for errors:
businessFormationDefaults.nameCheckNeedsToSearchErrorText: Please check availability of this name.
businessFormationDefaults.successPageBody: The documents you requested are listed below.
businessFormationDefaults.partnershipRightsRadioErrorText: Please make a selection for the following question(s).
businessFormationDefaults.reviewStepPartnershipYesCanReceiveDistri: **Yes**, the limited partners have the right to receive distributions from a partner. (This can  include a return of all or any part of their partner’s contributions).
businessFormationDefaults.reviewStepPartnershipYesLimitedPartnerBo: **Yes**, the limited partners can assign other partners limited partner rights.
businessFormationDefaults.agentOfficeAddressCityErrorText: Enter the city for your agent’s office.
businessFormationDefaults.reviewStepPartnershipYesCanMakeDistribut: **Yes**, general partners have the right to make distributions to any partner. (This includes a return of all or any part of the partner’s contributions).
businessFormationDefaults.legalStructureWarningModalHeader: You Might Need a Different Form
businessFormationDefaults.optInAnnualReportText: I want to be reminded of any Annual Reports Filing(s), so that I never miss an Annual Report deadline.
businessFormationDefaults.additionalSignatureNameErrorText: Enter the first and last name of each signer.
businessFormationDefaults.nameCheckAvailableText: "${name}" is available. This name will be registered with the State ONLY after you submit the rest of this form.
businessFormationDefaults.membersSuccessTextBody: A member has been added successfully.
businessFormationDefaults.combinedInvestmentBody: List the funds and the value of properties and services each of the partners have agreed to contribute.
businessFormationDefaults.optInCorpWatchText: I want to sign up for CorpWatch Alerts to notify me when any charter document filing is performed for my business.

businessFormationDefaults.reviewStepPartnershipNoCanReceiveDistrib: **No**, the limited partners do not have the right to receive distributions from a partner. (This can  include a return of all or any part of their partner’s contributions).
businessFormationDefaults.successPageSubheader: You have successfully formed your business entity and registered your business name!
businessFormationDefaults.nameCheckSpecialCharacterMarkDown: "${name}" contains invalid special characters which may not be used in the Business Name for online filing. If you would like to use special characters you will need to file a paper application using the form located at [treasury](https://www.state.nj.us/treasury/revenue/pdf/2000.pdf).
businessFormationDefaults.agentEmailErrorText: Enter the agent’s email in format name@example.com.
businessFormationDefaults.nameCheckDesignatorText: It looks like there's a designator in your name such as LLC, LP or CORP. Please remove it and try searching again. You can officially form your business once you've found an available name.
businessFormationDefaults.reviewPageAmendmentText:
#### Make sure everything is accurate before submitting. 

 If you need to make a change after submitting, you will need to file a [paper amendment](https://www.njportal.com/DOR/BusinessAmendments/Forms/IdentifyBusiness).

selfRegistration.errorTextGeneric: Something went wrong, please try again later.
selfRegistration.errorTextEmailsNotMatching: Email addresses must match and be valid.
selfRegistration.loginErrorModalTitle: To Access the Navigator, Link Your Account
selfRegistration.userTestingCheckboxLabel: I am willing to be contacted to provide feedback on Business.NJ.gov.
selfRegistration.errorTextDuplicateSignUp: This email is already registered, please login instead.
selfRegistration.loginErrorModalBody:
Looks like you already have an account with myNewJersey, our state authentication provider! You need to follow a few steps to link your login information to the Navigator.

1. When you move on from this page, you'll step through a set of initial questions to learn more about you and your business.
2. When you reach your Business Guide, you'll be prompted to **Complete Registration** with a link to myNewJersey.
3. On the myNewJersey page, you'll be asked if you have existing login information. Click **yes** and enter your myNewJersey credentials.

After following these steps, you'll be able to use your myNewJersey account to log in to the Business Navigator!
selfRegistration.signUpDescriptionText: To get started, please enter your name and email address below.
selfRegistration.errorTextFullNameLength: Full name must be 50 characters or fewer
selfRegistration.newsletterCheckboxLabel: I want to receive the Business.NJ.gov newsletter and receive information likely to affect my business.
selfRegistration.errorTextFullNameSpecialCharacter: Full name may only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and these five characters: , . - ' _
selfRegistration.errorTextFullNameStartWithLetter: Full name must start with a letter

navigationDefaults.guestModalTitle: ## Create an Account to Access this Feature
navigationDefaults.guestAlertBody: Now that you've filled out your business information, you can save your progress and come back later by [creating an account](/self-register/guest_snackbar).
navigationDefaults.guestSuccessBody: You can now save your progress, access more features, and edit your profile.
navigationDefaults.guestAlertTitle: ### Complete Registration to Save Your Progress
navigationDefaults.guestModalBody: To use this feature, you need to complete your registration with the State of New Jersey's secure login system, MyNewJersey. This will ensure your privacy, and allow you to come back any time.

dashboardDefaults.certificationsSnackbarBody: The certification programs you may be eligible for are now listed in the “For You” section on the right side of the screen.
dashboardDefaults.fundingSnackbarBody: The funding programs you may be eligible for are now listed in the “For You” section on the right side of the screen.
dashboardDefaults.calendarSnackbarBody: You can see your next reporting due date at the bottom of this page.
dashboardDefaults.calendarTooltip: This calendar shows you New Jersey tax and reporting due dates unique to your business. Click on any item to learn where to file.
dashboardDefaults.calendarLegalText: This calendar is not a complete list of your obligations as a business.
dashboardDefaults.sectorModalBody: To see what funding opportunities you’re eligible for, tell us your...
dashboardDefaults.hiddenTasksSnackbarBody: As an up-and-running business, we have streamlined your experience.
dashboardDefaults.congratulatoryModalHeader: You reached a crucial milestone as a business.
dashboardDefaults.emptyOpportunitiesText: If you're seeing this, you might have hidden all items. Don't worry, you can view all hidden items below.
dashboardDefaults.emptyOpportunitiesHeader: We're looking for State opportunities you may be eligible for, but have not found a match yet.
dashboardDefaults.emptyCalendarTitleText: ### Looks like you do not have any filings due!
dashboardDefaults.emptyCalendarBodyText: If you are an LLC, C Corp, L,P, or LLP, you need to tell us your business formation date so we can tell you when your next filing is due. You can do this by [updating your profile](#).

landingPage.section5FirstSupportingText: Knowing exactly what your business needs to do to start can be difficult. Our step-by-step guide is unique to your industry and even includes Cannabis retailers. Find what licenses, forms, and permits you need to start your business in New Jersey. Learn the requirements of each application, find out what you get after submitting your application, and store critical business identification numbers all in one place.
landingPage.card1SupportingText: Visit our website with more resources to start, operate, and grow your business.
landingPage.card2SupportingText: Already a registered business and want to know the latest grants and regulations likely to affect your business? Join our weekly newsletter.
landingPage.card3SupportingText: Local experts are available 9 a.m– 5 p.m Eastern Time, Monday through Friday, to help you with any business challenge.
landingPage.section5SecondSupportingText: Don’t leave money on the table. Find out if you are eligible for State funding opportunities. Learn about potential grants, tax credits, technical assistance programs, and more. If you are a minority-owned, woman-owned, veteran-owned, or small business, you can find out which certifications apply to you and increase your chances of getting government contracts.
landingPage.section2HeaderText: Starting a Business Has Never Been Faster or Easier!
landingPage.section3HeaderText: Grow Your Business, Get Guidance on State Funding or Certifications!
landingPage.section2SupportingText: See the forms and licenses specific to starting your business and avoiding fines. Be prepared to tell us your legal structure, industry, and business location.
landingPage.section3SupportingText: Identify funding programs and certifications across State agencies that fit your business.
landingPage.section5ThirdSupportingText: The Navigator is a one-stop-shop for all your New Jersey business needs. You can track your progress, check the status of applications, speak to NJ-based business advocates, and more!
landingPage.heroSupportingText: Create your free, personalized guide to register and find funding for your New Jersey or out-of-state business.

feedbackModal.unsuccessfulSubmissionAlertText: There was an error. Please try again or email your issue to jessica@business.nj.gov.
feedbackModal.reportIssueModalDetailAdditionalBodyText: Walk us through, step-by-step what happened. (i.e. This is my first time trying to create an account. When I was on the landing page I clicked “Get Started” but then nothing happened.)
feedbackModal.feedbackModalTitle: Let us know what you think
feedbackModal.reportIssueModalSummaryAdditionalBodyTex: What is the issue you experienced? (i.e. I was not able to log in.)
feedbackModal.feedbackModalBodyText: Get in contact, report a bug, or share your feedback.
feedbackModal.featureRequestModalSecondBodyText: Describe below the information or feature you are looking for.
feedbackModal.feedbackModalShareFeedbackButtonText: Tell us is if the Navigator is helpful

taxCalendar.SnackbarSuccessBody: Your businesses tax deadlines are now in your calendar.
taxCalendar.AccessBody: Get access to your tax calendar
taxCalendar.ModalErrorHeader: Review the fields below for errors or omissions
taxCalendar.ModalTaxIdMarkdown:
Enter the 12-digit number below (xxx-xxx-xxx/xxx). 

 (You can find your Tax ID listed as your 'Filer ID' in your email confirmation subject 'Confirmation of New Jersey Business Registration').
taxCalendar.FailedErrorMessageMarkdown: Review your Tax ID and/or business name for a match with the information in your Business Registration Certificate. If you need assistance, you can chat with one of our business advocates.
taxCalendar.ModalBody: To access your tax records, we need to verify your information and get you access to New Jersey Department of Treasury's `Gov2Go|gov2go` platform.
taxCalendar.FailedTaxIdHelper: Enter a correct 12-digit NJ Tax ID
taxCalendar.PendingCopyMarkdown:
#### Your Tax Calendar is pending. 

 Your tax due dates are being added, check back in **7 days**.
taxCalendar.FailedUnknownMarkdown: There was a problem with your verification process, please try again later.
taxCalendar.ModalBusinessFieldMarkdown: Your business name must match exactly with the name listed on your `Business Registration Certificate|business-reg-certificate` or your tax registration confirmation email.

taxRegistrationModal.title: You're All Done with Tax Registration!
taxRegistrationModal.subtitle: Now we can see what certifications you're eligible for, tell us your...
taxRegistrationModal.areYouSureTaxBody: If you change your task status, you will will lose access to your Certifications. You can gain access to Certifications again once your status is marked as complete.

filingDefaults.lateFilingsMarkdown: All New Jersey taxes that are filed or paid past the due date, (penalities, interest, and collection fees)[https://www.nj.gov/treasury/taxation/njit19.shtml] may be assessed. If you are filing or paying late, read up on (abatements of penalities)[https://www.state.nj.us/treasury/taxation/abatement-info.shtml].

onboardingDefaults.errorTextMinimumRangeNumericField: Must be between ${min} and ${max} digits long.

formationDateModal.fieldDescription: Find your effective date on your `Certificate of Formation|certificate-formation` . Once you submit your effective date, you will not be able to change it.
formationDateModal.areYouSureModalBody: If you change your task status, you will need to resubmit your Business `Effective Date|effective-date` and will lose access to your calendar.
formationDateModal.lockedStatusTooltipText: You have successfully completed forming your business in this task.
formationDateModal.errorText: Your effective date must be formatted as MM/YYYY.
formationDateModal.description: To see your annual report due date, please provide your Business' `effective date|effective-date` (the date you formed your business) below.

unsupportedNavigatorUserPage.title: Chat with a New Jersey Business Representative
unsupportedNavigatorUserPage.subtitle: It seems like you might have some unique needs, please use our chat feature to get guidance from a New Jersey-based business advocate. Should something change, you can come back and use this tool again later.
